name: Chekrut Serpent
text: If this card is added from the Deck to your hand by a card effect: You can Special Summon this card. If this card is in your GY and you control a "Chekrut" monster: You can banish this card, and target 1 "Chekrut" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Chekrut Serpent" once per turn.
